title: ChocoMimi, Volume 1
description: Reads R to L (Japanese Style) Choco and Mimi are best friends in eighth grade. Choco is serious and reliable, while Mimi is a bit spoiled and a lot silly, but they're both super-cute and ultra-stylish! A new boy transfers to the girls' class, and heChoco Sakurai and Mimi Nekota are in junior high school and best friends. Choco is serious and reliable, while Mimi is a bit spoiled and silly, but they're both super-cute and ultra-fashionable! Includes fashion tips, recipes and how-to guides!
author: Konami Sonoda
